titles.title: Veterans Emergency Room Relief Act of 2017
Veterans Emergency Room Relief Act of 2017

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay the reasonable costs of urgent care provided to certain veterans, to establish cost-sharing amounts for veterans receiving care at an emergency room of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
Veterans Emergency Room Relief Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.
